entry.title: “The Ultimate Rest” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 13 Q3 2021

media:group.media:title: “The Ultimate Rest” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 13 Q3 2021
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2021 quarter 3, lesson 13 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is “Rest in Christ” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “The Ultimate Rest” Join us every week for a fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Rev. 1:9–19; Matt. 24:4–8, 23–31; Rev. 14:6–12; Heb. 11:13–16; Phil. 4:4–6
“But as it is written: ‘Eye has not seen, nor ear heard, nor have entered into the heart of man the things which God has prepared for those who love Him’ ” (1 Cor. 2:9, NKJV).
(September 18–September 24)
Sunday (Jill Morikone) - “A Vision of the End” Monday (Ryan Day) - “The Countdown” Tuesday (John Lomacang) - “Marching Orders” Wednesday (Shelley Quinn) - “Rest in Peace” Thursday (John Dinzey) - “Rejoice in the Lord Always”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2021:3Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ321_13.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PANEL PODCAST: https://3abn.org/ssp-podcast.html

media:group.media:description:

See how sending students or supporting them financially is making a huge difference for the kingdom of God. Hosted by Ryan Day. entry.title: “Christ’s Return and the Two Resurrections” - 3ABN Today (TDY210043)

media:group.media:title: “Christ’s Return and the Two Resurrections” - 3ABN Today (TDY210043)
media:group.media:description:
Shelley Quinn and Ryan Day present scriptural evidence for: the manner of Christ’s majestic return; the supernatural change for the saints of God—those who remain alive at His coming, and the resurrection of the righteous; the millennium; the second resurrection of condemnation and death of the wicked; and the creation of a new earth.
TDY210043

entry.title: (SDA Sermon) Wake Up and Sound the Alarm by John Dinzey

media:group.media:title: (SDA Sermon) Wake Up and Sound the Alarm by John Dinzey
media:group.media:description:
In this sermon produced by 3ABN, John Dinzey will share from the Bible and the writings of Ellen G. White an urgent appeal for God’s people to wake up and get ready for what is coming. It's time now more than ever to bring the gospel to the world. The signs of the times indicate that the events foretold in the book of Revelation will soon be fulfilled.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: “Will God Punish Me for an Insincere Prayer?“ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210026)

media:group.media:title: “Will God Punish Me for an Insincere Prayer?“ 3ABN Today Bible Q & A (TDYQA210026)
media:group.media:description:

entry.title: “The Restless Prophet” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 12 Q3 2021

media:group.media:title: “The Restless Prophet” | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 12 Q3 2021
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2021 quarter 3, lesson 12 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is “Rest in Christ” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “The Restless Prophet” Join us every week for a fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Jonah 1–4, Jer. 25:5, Ezek. 14:6, Rev. 2:5, Luke 9:51–56, Jude 1–25
“ ‘And should I not pity Nineveh, that great city, in which are more than one hundred and twenty thousand persons who cannot discern between their right hand and their left—and much livestock?’ ” (Jonah 4:11, NKJV).
(September 11–September 17)
Sunday (Kenny Shelton) - “Running Away” Monday (Jill Morikone) - “A Three-Day Rest” Tuesday (Jason Bradley) - “Mission Accomplished” Wednesday (John Lomacang) - “An Angry, Restless Missionary” Thursday (Shelley Quinn) - “A Two-Way Street”

media:group.media:title: “A Sure Pathway to Health” - 3ABN Today (TDY210047)
media:group.media:description:
In a world being bombarded with disease and illnesses of every kind, there is hope! God has provided a pathway to health that brings stability and prevention even during the pandemic. Join Ryan Day and special guest Lucia Tiffany MPH RN as they discuss ways you can strengthen your health during these times of uncertainty.
Learn more: https://luciatiffany.com/

This quarter's book topic is “Rest in Christ” and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Longing for More” Join us every week for a fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
1 Cor. 10:1–11, Lev. 4:32–35, John 1:29, Heb. 4:1–11, Ps. 95:8–11
“Now these things took place as examples for us, that we might not desire evil as they did” (1 Cor. 10:6, ESV).
(September 4–September 10)
Sunday (John Dinzey) - “Sabbath and Creation” Monday (John Lomacang) - “Celebrating Freedom” Tuesday (Shelley Quinn) - “The Stranger in Your Gates” Wednesday (Ryan Day) - “Serving Others Honors God's Sabbath” Thursday (Jill Morikone) - “The Sign That We Belong to God”

media:group.media:title: “Grow the Population of Heaven” - 3ABN Today (TDY210044)
media:group.media:description:
We can still be about our Father’s business even when it’s tough. In fact, now more than ever! This is the last opportunity we have to grow the population of Heaven! Our target should be the darkest places on earth. Hear about what God is doing through the amazing ministry of Jesus for Asia. Hosted by Greg Morikone. Guests: Jon Wood, President, Jesus for Asia; Natalie Wood, Co-Founder, Jesus for Asia.
Learn more: https://jesus4asia.org/
TDY210044
